1: <pb/><e>B'ich re li taqsink. Xsaalm laj David.</e> <pb/><t>At Qaawa', ink'a' ninnimob'resi wib'</t> <t>chi moko ninq'etq'eti wib'.</t> <t>Ink'a' ninsik' xninqal ru na'leb'</t> <t>chi moko k'a' re ru jwal ch'a'aj cho'q we.</t>
2: <t>Wankin b'an sa' xyaalal ut tuqtuukilal,</t> <t>kama' jun k'uula'al toj xmaq'e'k li xtu'.</t> <t>K'ojk'o li waanm jo' jun k'uula'al toj xmaq'e'k li xtu'.</t>
3: <pb/><t>At Israel, chiwanq aawoyb'enihom rik'in li Qaawa'</t> <t>chalen anaqwan ut junelik q'e kutan.</t>
